name: A Block Ninja Endless Run-ning Jump-ing Game
name_original: A Block Ninja Endless Run-ning Jump-ing Game
description:
A Block Ninja is a simple endless ninja runner, jumper, platformer, all out funner. As a tiny block Ninja you need jump to reach the platforms. Sees simple, only it's not that easy - The runway and platforms don't stay where they should so you'll have to be pretty skillful to jump in time to make it before the platform disappears.

The aim is to go as fast as you can covering the most distance and outrunning your friends.

It's a fast and super addictive casual arcade game with endless game play.

Features:
- Simple but fun one touch arcade game
- Game gets faster and more difficult
- Endless mode, enjoy the fun more and more
- Cute minimilst graphics
- Game Center integration so you can compare your score with your friends.

Thank you for downloading and have fun :D
